author: mirichmo
body:
Fixes #2994

Result:
``` powershell
PS F:\GitRepos\PowerShell> get-computerinfo

. . .
WindowsCurrentVersion                                   : 6.3
WindowsEditionId                                        : Enterprise
WindowsInstallationType                                 : Client
WindowsProductName                                      : Windows 10 Enterprise
WindowsVersion                                          : 1607
WindowsUBR                                              : 577
. . .
```
title: Add WindowsUBR to Get-ComputerInfo
